mapper.sql: sys_driver_id, user_name, password, full_name, mobile_phone, pay_code, user_status, is_ident, plate_number, expiry_date, fuel_type, driving_lice, vehicle_lice, identity_card, card_id, sys_user_account_id, sys_transport_id, regis_company, regis_source, created_date, updated_date, is_first_charge, checked_status, checked_date, sys_gas_station_id
mapper.select:
select
from sys_driver where 1=1
and full_name like CONCAT(#{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or mobile_phone like CONCAT(#{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY created_date DESC

update sys_driver
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
full_name = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_code = #{payCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where sys_driver_id = #{sysDriverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

and mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sys_gas_station_id = #{sys_gas_station_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
